name: Color Piano Ball: Jump and Hit
name_original: Color Piano Ball: Jump and Hit
description:
Drag, jump, and hit the piano block of the same color. Pop up a beautiful piano music.
Come on, get high score to be the champion on the leaderboard.

Game features:
- Unique creative gameplay
- Easy to play but hard to master
- Simple and smooth controls
- 4 beautiful 3D scenes
